#type:     node
#context:  sop
#internal: labs::ml_cv_directory_import-1.0
#icon:     /labs_icons/sidefxlabs_default.svg
#since:    20.5

= Labs ML CV Directory Import =

"""Imports the assets from a directory."""


This node imports a folder of assets either one at a time by index or all at once using the file name as the name attribute.

:box:
    #display: raised yellow

    The original ML Computer Vision tools were developed by the Synthetic Data team at Endava PLC.


@parameters

    Directory:
        #id: dir
        Specifies the file path to the directory from which files will be imported.
        
    File Name Pattern:
        #id: filepattern
        Every matching file found within the directory (including
        subdirectories) will be added to the list of files to import.
        This parameter can contain wildcards.
        
    Import Number:
        #id: importnum
        The file index to be imported
        
    Import All:
        #id: importall
        When toggled on the entire directory (matching the file name pattern) gets imported.
        When toggled off the import number determines which file gets imported.
    

@examples

    TIP:
        When viewing in Houdini's Help Browser, please copy the example file's URL to a regular browser to proceed with the download.

    - [Example File|https://github.com/sideeffects/SideFXLabsExamples/blob/main/examples/ml_computer_vision/ml_computer_vision.1.0.zip]


@related
